players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm shocked Charlie is gone. With 1 mafia among 3 of us, we need solid votes. Alice, Diana—what are your thoughts on last night and who seems off so far?"
Diana: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Bob with me to end this now."

You: "Strong claim, Diana. If you're detective, why out Day 1 with no counter? Bob—respond. What did you do last night, and why would Diana fake this? Also, Diana, confirm: result says 'mafia' on Bob?"
Bob: remained silent.

Diana: "Yes, Alice—my result explicitly says Bob is mafia. Bob’s silence is telling. There’s only 1 mafia; if I were lying, we lose on a misvote. I’m detective, I outed because it wins today. Please vote Bob."
You: "Bob, if you’re town, speak now. Diana, if you die tonight after a Bob vote, that confirms you. With no counterclaim and Bob silent, I’m leaning Bob. Any last words, Bob?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm shocked Charlie is gone. With 1 mafia among 3 of us, we need solid votes. Alice, Diana—what are your thoughts on last night and who seems off so far?"
Diana: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Bob with me to end this now."

Alice: "Strong claim, Diana. If you're detective, why out Day 1 with no counter? Bob—respond. What did you do last night, and why would Diana fake this? Also, Diana, confirm: result says 'mafia' on Bob?"
You: remained silent.

Diana: "Yes, Alice—my result explicitly says Bob is mafia. Bob’s silence is telling. There’s only 1 mafia; if I were lying, we lose on a misvote. I’m detective, I outed because it wins today. Please vote Bob."
Alice: "Bob, if you’re town, speak now. Diana, if you die tonight after a Bob vote, that confirms you. With no counterclaim and Bob silent, I’m leaning Bob. Any last words, Bob?"

players.name: Charlie

Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I'm shocked Charlie is gone. With 1 mafia among 3 of us, we need solid votes. Alice, Diana—what are your thoughts on last night and who seems off so far?"
You: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Bob with me to end this now."

Alice: "Strong claim, Diana. If you're detective, why out Day 1 with no counter? Bob—respond. What did you do last night, and why would Diana fake this? Also, Diana, confirm: result says 'mafia' on Bob?"
Bob: remained silent.

You: "Yes, Alice—my result explicitly says Bob is mafia. Bob’s silence is telling. There’s only 1 mafia; if I were lying, we lose on a misvote. I’m detective, I outed because it wins today. Please vote Bob."
Alice: "Bob, if you’re town, speak now. Diana, if you die tonight after a Bob vote, that confirms you. With no counterclaim and Bob silent, I’m leaning Bob. Any last words, Bob?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
